Author: Moderator
Message: Welcome Fluffball.

Author: Fluffball
Message: Hello fellow human!

Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you for participating in this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the next posts, I'll be going over the rules of the "game" you're about to play.

Author: Moderator
Message: Once I'll be done, I'll ask you if you've understood the rules, and if you haven't I'll explain them in different words.

Author: Moderator
Message: You're about to talk to Andrew. Andrew is a fictive character that has been completely created for the purpose of this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: You'll be talking to him twice.

Author: Moderator
Message: The only difference between the two conversations you'll have with him, is that in one of them Andrew will be played by a real human.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the other, it will be played by an Artificial Intelligence we are developing.

Author: Moderator
Message: We will call the Human and the Artificial Intelligence the Actors.

Author: Moderator
Message: The order in which you'll be talking to each Actor is random.

Author: Moderator
Message: You will not be talking twice with the same Actor.

Author: Moderator
Message: Both the Artificial Intelligence and the Human will try to portray the same Andrew in the most convincing way they can.

Author: Moderator
Message: Your goal is simple. After talking to the two actors, you'll have to guess which one was the Artificial Intelligence and which one was the Human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Whenever you have made your decision, you are able to stop the conversation.

Author: Moderator
Message: Each conversation will last for 15 minutes maximum if you do not decide to stop it before.

Author: Moderator
Message: Please, keep your posts to text only (No smileys, no links... etc)

Author: Moderator
Message: Do not type more than one post per answer.

Author: Moderator
Message: Do you understand the rules and what you have to do?

Author: Fluffball
Message: I do.

Author: Moderator
Message: Good. Andrew will start the conversation. The 15 minutes will start after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: Fluffball
Message: I am.

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: Fluffball
Message: Hello there!

Author: Andrew
Message: How are you doing?

Author: Fluffball
Message: I'm doing quite nicely myself, and you?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm doing quite alright thanks! What are you up to?

Author: Fluffball
Message: Well, at the moment I'm talking to you!

Author: Andrew
Message: Fair enough! What kind of games do you like?

Author: Fluffball
Message: Oh, I'm quite fond of Adventure games myself. Playing the new Zelda at the moment, and I'm quite liking it? Have you played that one yet, my fellow human?

Author: Andrew
Message: Nah I haven't actually. I've been more into Minecraft and Mass Effect lately.

Author: Fluffball
Message: Oh yes? I've heard the new Mass Effect has some pretty bad animations, what's your stance on that?

Author: Andrew
Message: They've fixed some of it in the latest patch, so there's hope! Mass Effect never had fantastic facial animations though. But they used to be better.

Author: Fluffball
Message: Yeah, I really liked the original trilogy! Everyone complained about 3's ending, but I still thought it was a solid game overall. My favorite class was the Adept in those games, how about you?

Author: Andrew
Message: I liked the Sentinel. I think that's the name of the biotic one right? I'm not sure anymore. But yeah, I didn't really like the original ending, but the Extended Cut DLC fixed most of the issues.

Author: Fluffball
Message: Have you played any of the Metal Gear games? V was a fantastic game, but kinda fell short in its plot compared to the ones that came before it . Really fun gameplay though!

Author: Andrew
Message: No I never have. I did hear they were great though yes.

Author: Fluffball
Message: Fair enough. To change the subject, have you seen the new Star Wars teaser? If so, what did you think of it?

Author: Andrew
Message: Wait, there's a new Star Wars?

Author: Fluffball
Message: Sure is, new trailer just dropped!

Author: Andrew
Message: Damn I'll have to check it out.

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to (This is not your final answer)

Author: Fluffball
Message: I think this was the human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright. We'll begin the next conversation. Andrew will start, and then you'll have 15 minutes after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: Fluffball
Message: I'm ready!

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: Fluffball
Message: Hello my fellow human!

Author: Andrew
Message: How are you doing?

Author: Fluffball
Message: I'm doing absolutely wonderfully? What of yourself?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm doing quite alright thanks! What are you up to?

Author: Fluffball
Message: At the moment I'm talking to you!

Author: Andrew
Message: Could be more exciting then!

Author: Fluffball
Message: Oh yes? How do you like to spend your free time?

Author: Andrew
Message: Mostly playing video games really. Like Minecraft and Mass Effect.

Author: Fluffball
Message: Good choices? What did you think about Mass Effect's weird animation controversy?

Author: Andrew
Message: It was definitely deserved. The faces looked off most of the time, but the latest patch fixed some of it. So I guess there is some hope!

Author: Fluffball
Message: Fair enough! I've been playing the new Zelda lately myself, what do you know about that one?

Author: Andrew
Message: Pretty much nothing actually. On which console is it?

Author: Fluffball
Message: The Nintendo Switch, just came out recently. Have you played many Nintendo games?

Author: Andrew
Message: Not really, except for Mario obviously. And Mario Kart on the Wii.

Author: Fluffball
Message: Which Mario did you play? Mario 64 was my first one.

Author: Andrew
Message: I think it was mine too actually. Was it the one in 3D?

Author: Fluffball
Message: It was the first one in 3D, so I guess! You play any other N64 games?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm not sure, I was quite young at that time and I don't remember most of them.

Author: Fluffball
Message: Okay. Any classic films you're quite fond of?

Author: Andrew
Message: I like Start Wars, The Lord of the Rings, Harry Potter... and many others.

Author: Fluffball
Message: Star Wars is great! Remember who the father of Luke Skywalker is?

Author: Andrew
Message: Of course, Anakin, or Darth Vader.

Author: Fluffball
Message: Correct! And remember who he kills at the end of VI?

Author: Andrew
Message: Who are you talking about?

Author: Fluffball
Message: You know, the evil ruler of the galaxy! Remember his name?

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to in the first conversation?

Author: Fluffball
Message: First conversation I still think was human.

Author: Moderator
Message: On a scale from 1 (not sure at all) to 7 (certain), how confident are you of your answer?

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright thank you for your participation! If you've given your e-mail, we'll send you some information about the results of this study in the coming months.

Author: Moderator
Message: If you have any comments you'd like to share, feel free to do so now. Otherwise you can now close this window.
